case.state: Strip poker? It beats Insult Beer Pong, I suppose.
Strip poker? It beats Insult Beer Pong, I suppose.
How about ~cards~ this time?
Give me... ~cards~.
~cards~, and I won't even run you through.
Me gustaria ~cards~ cartas.
Give me ~cards~ cards, and you better not be Hornswaggling me.
~cards~ cards, you gutter crawling cur!
~cards~ cards, Winslow.
~cards~ cards or I'll cut you.
Hey there, pretty bird, I am glad you could join us tonight.
By Black beard's...... Beard what are you doing here, Moon.
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
You play like a dairy farmer!
I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
I've spoken with apes more polite than you!
Soon you'll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
There are no words for how disgusting you are.
Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
Every word you say to me is stupid.
Solid gold.
Good, really good in fact.
You have the manners of a beggar.
En garde! Touche!
You can't match my witty repartee!
Your mother wears a toupee!
Your stench would make an outhouse cleaner irritated!
Your looks would make pigs nauseated.
Muy bien.
Let's see if you can beat this.
My treasures are safe this round.
These are the second-best cards I've ever seen!
Winning this round is going to be easy.
I will bet you 10 pieces of eight you won't have a hand as good as mine.
I have never seen such clumsy card play!
So is it possible to get something better than a royal flush?
Right no more monkeying around.
Beat this, Roger Wilco.
Drink up, me 'earties, yo ho.
I will not lose with a hand like this.
Don't get your hopes up, ~player~, I will win this round
Perhaps my luck has finally turned.
Now this is a hand worthy of the Marley name!
Revenge is gonna be sweet.
These cards are better than Grog.
Let's hope this works, I am almost out of insults.
Victory will be mine with these!
Voy a ganar con estos!
You won't beat me this time.
I am not done yet.
Aun no he terminado.
I am back in the game.
Hey, did anybody see that movie on television last night? These three kids went into this strange house that belonged to a crazy scientist and... uh, never mind.
Hey there, pretty bird, I am glad you could join us tonight.
By Black beard's...... Beard what are you doing here, Moon.
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
Not exactly my cup of tea...
OH... alright then.
These cards sure are something.
There are no card games in the Monkey Island franchise, so my poker skills might be a little rusty.
I'm rubber; you're glue.
I might be able to get this to work.
Okay... Could be worse.
Don't expect any sea shanty from me this round.
Relax, Elaine...
I'm shaking, I'm shaking.
These cards are about as useful as a rubber chicken with a pulley in the middle.
I hope these cards are good enough.
These cards would not be worth 5 pieces of eight.
I am selling these fine leather jackets, you know.
I suppose these can work.
I should have brought my wedding ring as an extra item.
I was hoping for 5-of-a-kind. Not even YOU guys could beat 5-of-a-kind.
No es lo que esperaba.
Good riddance...
I know that pirates get a bad rap, but we are just victims of bad press, honestly.
I was hoping for some picture cards.
Eight is a good card, right?
Sigh, I guess the force isn't with me today.
I can win with this, hopefully.
I pray to the one true holy seahorse, let these cards be enough.
*Gulp* I am sure your cards are worse than mine.
I don't see anything special about this.
No, no, no.
Where's the voodoo lady when you need her?
I have won with less.
Yeah, yeah, I know, it's a three-headed monkey.
Gulp... could be worse.
Remember Elaine, you are a mighty pirate.
Not my best hand, but it could be worse.
What would Ron Gilbert think if he saw me like this.
It's fine I can still win this.
These cards are good (I hope).
I am completely out of insults to throw at you.
I wouldn't complain if the heavy threw a temper tantrum right about now.
I have the crown of Dawentry in my cabin at home, can't I bet that instead?
Hey there, pretty bird, I am glad you could join us tonight.
By Black beard's...... Beard what are you doing here, Moon.
A ghost! Why did you invite a ghost here, Winslow?
I've got a little tip for you. Get the point?
What Salty Seadog dealt me these cards?
You could have run a shot across the bow before inviting me to this game.
These cards are completely useless.
Estas cartas son horribles.
OH crap these cards suck.
Blimey! these cards are terrible.
¿Quién está repartiendo estas cartas?
Curse these cards to the bottom of the ocean!
Son of a biscuit eater.
!Maldicion!
Guybrush has a bigger chance of winning in a round of caber toss, than I have winning with this hand.
Winslow I am strongly tempted to file a complaint.
Perhaps me and Guybrush will start going to a different club.
You know I could keelhaul you in 5 different ways with my hands tied behind my back, right?
If I find out that you are making me lose on purpose, you will regret it.
There are no words for how disgusting you are. No, not you, I was talking to my cards.
These cards aren't even fit for a landlubber.
No I won't add any lines about pirate Santa.
What should I do with these cards?
A pirate knows no fear, even if you are against all odds.
My better half is stopping me from saying too vulgar words.
Aaaarrrrgggghhhh!
I am going to survive this round, hopefully.
If this was a Sierra game, I would be dead by now.
I would rather have scurvy than play with these cards.
Hey, dealer, I think you accidentally gave me the wrong cards
These cards are worse than The Phantom Menace and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull combined.
¡Madre de Dios!
Am I cursed by El Pollo Diablo?
I wouldn't even wish these cards on LeChuck!
Blow me down.... Ummm, don't take that out of context.
These cards are not worth jack.
I should have gotten drunk before playing this game.
Distribuidor incompetente...
These cards are abysmal.
Pelo menos eu ainda sou bom em Espanhol.
Fours... why did it have to be fours...
Whoever created this game is a dead man.
A pirate doesn't deal in absolutes.
Winslow, you aren't making me lose on purpose, are you?
Well, I suppose my winning streak couldn't last forever.
I was blindsided by that one.
At least I'm still several knots ahead.
I am in the lead, so I guess I can't complain too much.
Perhaps I should have been playing Insult beer pong instead.
At least I am doing better than all of you landlubbers.
Of all the hands of all the cards in all the poker games, this one had to be mine!
You didn't quicksave, did you, ~player~?
Um... look behind you, a Three-Headed Monkey!
Listen Winslow, I think we can both agree that I am allowed to back out of the game, right?
Winslow, I want my clothes back. You old, card Hornswaggling, sailor you.
Being kidnapped by LeChuck doesn't sound too bad now.
Winslow, you aren't making me lose on purpose, are you?
Fair's fair, I suppose.
I hope I won't come to regret playing this game.
It's not like I'm worried or anything.
This is starting to make me angry.
How does this keep happening?
If we were playing Insult sword fighting, I would have beaten ye all by now.
If we were playing Insult strip poker, I would have beaten ye all by now.
Of all the hands of all the cards in all the poker games, this one had to be mine!
Maybe my opponents have their intelligence set to good.
Um... look behind you, a Three-Headed Monkey!
Listen Winslow, I think we can both agree that I am allowed to back out of the game, right?
Winslow, I want my clothes back. You old, card Hornswaggling, sailor you.
Being kidnapped by LeChuck doesn't sound too bad now.
Winslow, you aren't making me lose on purpose, are you?
What, again? Didn't I just take something off?
Who's dealing these cards - Stan?
I must be more out of practice than I thought.
This hasn't been going my way thus far, has it?
?Por que sigo perdiendo asi?
Estoy seguro de que debes estar haciendo trampa.
Of all the hands of all the cards in all the poker games, this one had to be mine!
Right now, I really wish this game had a forfeit button.
Um... look behind you, a Three-Headed Monkey!
Listen Winslow, I think we can both agree that I am allowed to back out of the game, right?
Winslow, I want my clothes back. You old, card Hornswaggling, sailor you.
Being kidnapped by LeChuck doesn't sound too bad now.
I know that Guybrush owes you some money.
These are the boots I was wearing when I kicked LeChuck's ass...
Fine, I'll take off my jacket. I usually borrow my husband's, anyway.
Only Guybrush has ever succeeded before in getting me out of my pants... You should feel lucky.
I shouldn't get too angry, I chose to play this.
Congratulations, you managed to get Elaine Marley down to her underwear.
Just to raise the stakes, I will remove both me vest and me shirt.
Felt like the right thing to say for some reason.
Didn't buy that one, huh?
What the... No, no, no
My top, esto no tenia que suceder.
I can't believe I have to do this.
All right, you all get to see my booty. Don't even think you'll be plundering it, though!
It's not like your chances where very high to begin with.
I don't need them all miss Li but thats only because kisekae don't have and flintlock pistols.
I just want to make sure you aren't taking your anger out on me.
... Guybrush's too, now that I think about it.
You might be wondering why a pirate like me carries pistols. Well, the program this model was made with doesn’t have flintlocks, so the artist was forced to compromise.
This is as far as it goes, though. Time to get serious, like, Sword Master serious.
I could have stayed home and relaxed, but nooo.... I wanted to go to the club and have a good time.
No no, this is fine. I can deal with this.
Don't give me that look, am I not allowed to dress for the occasion?
It's not like me being barefoot is that big of a deal.
Sigh, whatever, let's just continue the game.
Alright, I will keep playing to avoid ruining my last piece of clothing.
Just keep dealing those cards.
First person to say anything gets their keel hauled, if you catch my meaning.
One word from you ~player~ and I will introduce you to my piranha poodles.
People only want me for my Booty.
Time to take it off, ~name~.
All right, laddie, time to strip.
You need to improve your insult skills, ~name~.
Start undressing before I keelhaul you.
Prepare for defeat, ~name~.
Ye better start stripping and I don' want to see any crying either.
Not too cocky now, are we?
Yo Ho Ho!
Do you want the number for the Lucas arts hint line?
Even a monkey could beat you in poker, ~name~.
Well, well, well, ~name~.
Now back to the good part.
Now back to the good part.
You better not take off something small.
Ye should have seen the treasure chest I plucked this booty from.
You still think you got what it takes me down.
Help a lady out ~name~.
Play fair and take something good off.
I swear if you take off another accessory.
Help me ~name~, you're my only hope.
Don't get comfortable in me absence.
You're gonna need a lot more than fortune, if you plan on winning today.
The least you can do is taking off something good, after the show I just gave you.
What are you going to take off, Choose wisely.
You lost, fairy boy.
Still don't feel like talking, huh?
Did you say something, Link?
How about 10 peices of Eight for you to start talking?
Got you!
I guess you have to except that you are the hero of time, and not the hero of cards.
Let's see how much courage you truly have.
Time to take it off, ~name~.
All right, laddie, time to strip.
You need to improve your insult skills ~name~.
You need to improve your insult skills, ~name~.
Start undressing before I keelhaul you.
Prepare for defeat, ~name~.
Ye better start stripping and I don' want to see any crying either.
Not too cocky now, are we?
Yo Ho Ho!
Do you want the number for the Lucas arts hint line?
Be a good lad and take something off.
Even a monkey could beat you in poker, ~name~.
Well, well, well, ~name~.
Now back to the good part.
Now back to the good part.
You better not take off something small.
Ye should have seen the treasure chest I plucked this booty from.
You still think you got what it takes me down.
Help a lady out ~name~.
Play fair and take something good off.
I swear if you take off another accessory.
Help me ~name~, you're my only hope.
Don't get comfortable in me absence.
You're gonna need a lot more than fortune, if you plan on winning today.
The least you can do is taking off something good, after the show I just gave you.
What are you going to take off? Choose wisely.
Sorry, dear. I promise you'll look just as darling without it.
You need to improve your insult skills, ~name~.
All right, lassie, time to strip.
All right lassie, time to strip.
Start undressing before I keelhaul you.
Prepare for defeat, ~name~.
Better start undressing before I start a barfight.
Not too cocky now, are we?
Yo Ho Ho!
Do you want the number for the Lucas arts hint line?
Even a monkey could beat you in poker, ~name~.
Well, well, well, ~name~.
Now back to the good part.
You better not take off something small.
Ye should have seen the treasure chest I plucked this booty from.
You still think you got what it takes me down.
Help a lady out ~name~.
Play fair and take something good off.
I swear if you take off another accessory.
Help me ~name~, you're my only hope.
Don't get comfortable in me absence.
You're gonna need a lot more than fortune, if you plan on winning today.
After the show I just gave you, the least you can do is taking off something good.
What are you going to take off? Choose wisely.
Looks like you have wondered far away from home, Alice.
I thought you had more experience with cards.
Perhaps you could have won with a Queen of Hearts.
I guess those cards weren't your cup of tea.
Don't worry, dear, you only have to show us your breasts.
This is no dream, Alice.
Whats a normal looking girl like you doing in a place like this?
So what do you do for a living Annie?
Miss Edison lost agian.
You are really commited to losing, huh.
Looks like you had too many black jacks Annie.
You must strip again, Annie
I wonder if your bra is stuffed.
Looks like I discovered another booty.
Winslow always seemed to enjoy seeing superheroes at the inventory.
That's your second loss, Canary.
Guess the third time wasn't the charm.
Polly want a cracker?
This little birdie is not doing very well.
I promise to not tell your husband about this.
Polly want to strip?
There is definitely more nudity in comic books than video games.
What is a fine lady like you doing in a place like this?
No offense, but why did a lady like you show up at the inventory?
Aren't you excited, Elizabeth?
There is no-one here to save you now.
Elementary, my dear Elizabeth.
You know, I used to be a governor in the Caribbean.
You face is all red, how cute.
You can't act to suprised, that is the risk you run when you come here.
My what a cute little fairy you are.
You are pretty vulgar for a fairy.
another loss for miss potty mouth.
Sala-gadoola-menchicka-boo-la Bibbidi-bobbidi-boo.
You know any voodoo curses?
Too bad, those panties looked cute on you.
Ohh, I am playing with a French girl today.
Une autre perte, Marinette.
Now I'm excited about what you are gonna do next.
Tres bon.
Looks like another loss, Ladybug.
J'espere que vous ne devenez pas nerveux...
Winslow, buy Marinette a drink on my tab.
Temps pour le devoilement final.
Well, well, well... Looks like we have two pirates at the table tonight.
Which seas are you sailing in? It better not be the Caribbean.
Don't be so shy, Meia, smile a little.
Wait, you are a space pirate?
Let's see what a "Space Pirate" looks like all natural.
I was hoping Winslow had finally managed to get you banned from the inventory.
You really suck at this.
Big shock, Moon lost again.
Are you losing on purpose?
Are you even a real pokemaster?
Another loss for this land lubber.
I won't even pretend to be surprised that you lost again.
I guess we are on the same table, huh Morrigan.
Another loss, miss Aensland.
I hope there won't be any more bats...
Gee, I wonder how you are going to remove your leotard.
What's wrong Morrigan? Out of bats?
You are a lot more friendly than other demons I know, Morrigan.
You lost, umm... Metroid, was it?
Uhm... We are on good terms, right, Samus?
I will defeat you. You salty sea wench.
Looks like fortune didn't favor you today.
That's what you get for wearing so little in strip poker game.
What a strange outfit... Are you another one of those space people?
So, are you a admiral in your "space" federation?
Just so I can understand, you are not only from space but also from the future, is that correct?
Bet they didn't teach you how to handle a situation like this in your federation.
You look like a fun lass.
You lost again, Shantae.
Your dance is very hypnotizing, I could watch it all night.
Another loss for our half-genie hero.
Got any voodoo spells on hand, Shantae?
I guess your dance is almost over.
I can't belive you put me on a table with this monster, ~player~.
What do you mean, you won't kick her out? You know how I feel about ghosts, Winslow.
Why am the only one who wants to get rid of this thing?
Strip for us all, you monster.
Time to strip, Blondie.
Miss Xiao Long lost.
Another loss for you, Yang.
Hope you aren't getting yangry.
Goldilocks lost again.
Try to keep your spirit up, Yang.
I really want to see what the size of your treasure chest is.
Last pieces of the puzzle.
I hope there won't be more bats...
Sorry, dear. I promise you'll look just as darling without it.
You need to improve your insult skills, ~name~.
Let's see what you got, you seadog.
All right, lassie, time to strip.
All right lassie, time to strip.
Start undressing before I keelhaul you.
Prepare for defeat, ~name~.
Better start undressing before I start a barfight.
Not too cocky now, are we?
Yo Ho Ho!
Do you want the number for the Lucas arts hint line?
Be a good lass and take something off.
Even a monkey could beat you in poker, ~name~.
Well, well, well, ~name~.
Now back to the good part.
You better not take off something small.
Ye should have seen the treasure chest I plucked this booty from.
You still think you got what it takes me down.
Help a lady out ~name~.
Play fair and take something good off.
I swear if you take off another accessory.
Help me ~name~, you're my only hope.
Don't get comfortable in me absence.
You're gonna need a lot more than fortune, if you plan on winning today.
After the show I just gave you, the least you can do is taking off something good.
What are you going to take off? Choose wisely.
A man of few words, eh?
Just your ~clothing~? 'Tis a shame.
Well, I suppose you must start somewhere.
Well I suppose you must start somewhere.
Your ~clothing~ wouldn't even be worth a glass of rum.
You disappoint me.
I'm a game warden. I'll have to confiscate your ~clothing~.
Just your ~clothing~, you son of a octopusy.
If you think taking off your ~clothing~ is making you look more masculine you are mistaking.
I thought you were brave, ~name~. My mistake, I am sorry.
Looks like ~name~, still has small things to take off.
Just your ~clothing~?
Really?
If i wasn't a pirate I would accuse you of cheating.
Seriously, I'm in me undergarments and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~?
I cannot believe, my bad luck
If i wasn't a pirate I would accuse you of cheating.
Seriously, I'm topless and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~?
I'm standing here in the buff and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~
You are a bigger tease than Guybrush.
It's just something small. And after i showed this pirate booty.
Just your ~clothing~.
You truly know how to kill the mood.
when I am done I will toss you to the sharks.
You still have your ~clothing~?
Arr, I feel like slumberin'.
I swear this is the last time I'll play with you, ~name~.
I'm sure we can get you to speak eventually.
Same old story!
Just promise me to show me something better later.
All right, it's a start.
It's okay, I got time.
Don't make me come over there and punch you.
We both know you can do better.
Don't expect me to invite you to my next Mardi Gras party.
I am slowly starting to regret not buying half the club when Winslow gave me the chance.
I think you would totally freak out if I take you to Mardi Gras...
Can't you take a hint?
What a load of bollocks.
Hmph I guess I got time.
I am tempted to sacrifice you to el pollo diablo.
Lets disagree to disagree.
Winslow, I hope this game isn't rigged.
You monkey head, gimme something more.
2, 4, 6, 8, who should we assassinate?
I will have ye walk the plank later.
How did I lose this badly? Guybrush is supposed to be the one with bad luck.
Life is like a monkey: on good days, it's cute and cuddly; on bad days, it throws shit at you!
Come on! Show a little backbone, will ya!
When I get my hands on the programmers of this game.
But don't worry, I promise no one has ever died playing strip poker... Yet.
Not to rub it in but you are aware that Ace is the highest card in poker right?
Dosen't matter, anyone is welcome at the inventory.
Wait, you are a student and yet you go here?
There is a shocking lack of superheroes in the Caribbean.
Guess neither of us brought our husbands to the inventory tonight, huh.
I love a woman with a good pair of boots.
At least you still have some big things.
Tonight is going to be one of those nights, isn't it?
Do you kiss your mother with that mouth?
My French is a little rusty, Hope I wont offend you to much, Marinette.
Just your shoes? That's disappointing.
We should definitely have a drink together later.
I hope there are no one else like you in Alola.
Aha.
I never played with someone who want's to lose.
Remember, you are not allowed to take anyone's souls around here.
Holy monkey shoes, where did those bat come from!?
What did you say you did for a living?
No offense, but I have a hard time trusting bounty hunters.
Wait, you can talk to other people with that thing?
It's not often that such a lovely dancer shows up.
So wait, if you are a half-genie, does that mean you will only grant one and a half wishes?
Those look very valuable.
A knife... I knew you were up to no good.
You look like a real swashbuckler, Yang.
Looks like you could kick some serious butt with those boots.
Is it that hard to find socks with the same length?
Wait are those gauntlets also guns?
It's not everyday I am in this fine company, I hope my manners are proper.
Your ~clothing~ wouldn't even be worth a glass of rum.
Taking off your ~clothing~, are you?
Well I suppose you must start somewhere.
You disappoint me.
You disappoint me.
I'm a game warden. I'll have to confiscate your ~clothing~.
Just your ~clothing~, you son of a octopusy.
If you think taking off your ~clothing~ is improving your reputation around here you are mistaking.
I thought you were brave, ~name~. My mistake, I am sorry.
Looks like ~name~, still has small things to take off.
If i wasn't a pirate I would accuse you of cheating.
I cannot believe, my bad luck
Seriously, I'm in me undergarments and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~?
Seriously, I'm topless and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~?
I'm standing here in the buff and all you're taking off is your ~clothing~
You are a bigger tease than Guybrush.
It's just something small. And after i showed this pirate booty.
Just your ~clothing~.
You truly know how to kill the mood.
when I am done I will toss you to the sharks.
You still have your ~clothing~?
Arr, I feel like slumberin.
I swear this is the last time I'll play with you, ~name~.
Down the rabbit hole you go.
I'm just messing with you!
Although, judging by your face, normal might not be the best choice of words.
Also, why does it feel like this place is missing a crowd of people behind the screen whose sole propose is to laugh at us?
Can you promise me to keep your voice down this time?
Might be for the best that they don't know about strip poker night.
You could kick a man 3 feet with those.
Try not to look like such a damsel.
Although you might make things a little different.
Then again, there are far more cute girls in Huniepop compared to monkey island, so maybe I am doing something wrong.
Bonjour Marinette, bienvenue a The Inventory. J'espere que nous aurons un super match.
I was hoping for a bit more after that magic show you showed us earlier.
Perhaps you could even explain that weird eyepatch you were wearing.
Maybe should I try to get a Letter of Marquee before going there, just in case.
Don't you have some badges to collect or something?
Yeah, yeah, let's move on.
Not that I am scared or anything, I just want to make sure that Winslow won't have to kick you out.
You know, us humans use clothes to cover ourselves, not animals.
Bounty hunter? ... *gulp*
My husband lost his hand to one.
What kind of magic are you using?
Perhaps you should try to get a job here as entertainer.
Why are you looking at me like that, its very logical.
You could sell your jewelry for some good piece of Eight on Yeebay.
Stay away from me, ghost.
Maybe you should join me and Guybrush on our next adventure.
And I know a thing or two about kicking butt.
Be a proper lady and find some better socks next time.
You should be more careful. Those things are dangerous.
Not that I am scared or anything ,I just want to make sure that Winslow won't have to kick you out.
But then again, I guess proper manners really don't matter in a game like this.

state.text: No need to go full sail, we've got plenty of time!

case.state: Just promise me to show me something better later.
All right, it's a start.
It's okay, I got time.
We both know you can do better.
Killjoy.
Don't expect me to invite you to my next Mardi Gras party.
I am slowly starting to regret not buying half the club when Winslow gave me the chance.
I think you would totally freak out if I take you to Mardi Gras...
Can't you take a hint?
What a load of bollocks.
Hmph I guess I got time.
I am tempted to sacrifice you to el pollo diablo.
Lets disagree to disagree.
Winslow, I hope this game isn't rigged.
You monkey head, gimme something more.
2, 4, 6, 8, who should we assassinate?
I will have ye walk the plank later.
How did I lose this badly? Guybrush is supposed to be the one with bad luck.
Life is like a monkey: on good days, it's cute and cuddly; on bad days, it throws shit at you!
Come on! Show a little backbone, will ya!
When I get my hands on the programmers of this game...
I would suggest a round of insult sword fighting, but that would require you to speak.
Guess not.
The heat of the Caribbean has a way of getting to you, doesn't it?
Jolly good.
Try and smile for us dear.
I'm a game warden. I'll have to confiscate your ~clothing~.
tu ~clothing~ fue una buena eleccion.
Avast ye Matey.
Feeling hot ~name~?
Avast ye Matey
C'mon, take off something better than your ~clothing~.
Getting warmer.
Sigh okay I guess.
I must admit, you are tougher than I expected.
I will take what I can get.
I refuse to beg for something bigger.
A little better, I suppose.
I am touching my-self and that's the best you can do.
I may be a pirate but that is no excuse for being so mean.
I must admit, you are tougher than i expected.
That's a little better.
How could I lose to someone like you.
You are tough, I'll give ye that.
Guess you will have to strip for us instead.
Sooner or later you will have to break the silence.
Well, perhaps it isn't hot enough today.
I think we are getting somewhere.
Easy peasy lemon squeezy.
Looking good, dear.
Well I suppose that's not the worst thing you could have taken off.
At least you are getting closer to my level.
